name: AFTERIMAGE (itch) (Bearish)
description:
AFTERIMAGE is a short looping platformer where all players share a persistent world, leave traps behind to impede others' progress and advance the global leaderboard.

This is for ludum dare 47 - consider voting for the game here https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/afterimage 

Font is m6x11 by Daniel Linssen - found here https://managore.itch.io/m6x11
